All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Constant Field Values

O

onActionAddAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
This method moves the current scene to the Appointment form.
onActionAddCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
This method moves the current scene to the Customer form.
onActionCancelAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ApptController
This method throws a specific warning dialog box, depending on whether the user was attempting to modify an existing appointment or add a new appointment.
onActionCancelCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerController
This method throws a specific warning dialog box, depending on whether the user was attempting to modify an existing customer or add a new customer.
onActionContactSelect(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsController
Upon making a selection in the contacts ComboBox, this method sets the "contactApptTable" with the selected contact's appointment information.
onActionDeleteAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
This method identifies the selected appointment from the appointments tableview and, upon user confirmation, removes the appointment from the database.
onActionDeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
This method identifies the selected customer from the customers tableview and performs a check for remaining appointments.
onActionGoBack(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsController
This method moves the current scene to the Main form.
onActionLogin(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginController
Upon validation for non-blank text-fields, this method checks the user's login credentials with "getUserId" method for existence in the database.
onActionLoginExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginController
This method throws a confirmation dialog box and, if confirmed, closes database connection and exits the application
onActionLogOut(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
Upon confirmation though use of a dialog box, this method changes the current scene to the Login GUI form and sets "currentUserID" object to null.
onActionSaveAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ApptController
This method checks the form for empty and non-selected fields, then inserts the form's user input data into the corresponding SQL statement depending on whether the user is intending to create a new appointment or modify an existing appointment.
onActionSaveCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerController
This method checks the form for empty and non-selected fields, then inserts the form's user input data into the corresponding SQL statement depending on whether the user is intending to create a new customer or modify an existing customer.
onActionShowReports(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
This method moves the current scene to the Reports form.
onActionUpdateAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
This method identifies the selected appointment, sets the appointment modification tracking variable to "true", then moves the current scene to the Appointment form.
onActionUpdateCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
This method identifies the selected customer, sets the customer modification tracking variable to "true", then moves the current scene to the Customer form.
onCountrySelection(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerController
This method changes the available selections in the "custStateComboBox" depending on which country is selected in the "custCountryComboBox".
onViewAllAppts(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
This method sets the Appointments tableview with all the appointments currently in the database.
onViewMonthAppts(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
This method sets the Appointments tableview with all the appointments currently in the database that fall within the current month.
onViewWeekAppts(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
This method sets the Appointments tableview with all the appointments currently in the database that fall within the current week.
openConnection() - Static method in class DAO.JDBC
This method establishes the connection to the database.
outsideBussHours(LocalTime, LocalTime) - Static method in class utlities.ValidationUtils
This method compares the appointment starting time to the start of business hours and the appointment ending time to the end of business hours.
overlapAlert() - Static method in class utlities.AlertUtils
This method creates an error dialog box for an appointment attempting to be scheduled overlapping with an existing appointment.
